attributes.action: Campaign for a public vote of no confidence against the Labour Party
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the current goverment do not wish to take any notice of the feelings and current mood of the general public I propose that the public have the right to have a vote of no confidence against the government and its unwillingness to listen to reason. The need for this petition being borne out of the fact that this govermnent plough ahead with incoherent policies which even their advisors tell them are inappropriate.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
